grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 瞳孔【ドウコウ】pupil (of the eye)
瞳孔拡張【ドウコウカクチョウ】pupil dilation
縮瞳【シュクドウ】miosis, myosis, (excessive) constriction of the pupil
散瞳【サンドウ】mydriasis, (excessive) dilation of the pupil
kun reading compounds: 瞳を凝らす【ひとみをこらす】to strain one's eyes, to stare
